summary: UPON BEING PULLED OVER BECAUSE MY TRIUMPH TIGER 1050 HAD OVERHEATED ONCE AGAIN, I LOOKED DOWN AND NOTICED THAT AS A RESULT OF THE OVERHEATING THAT THE ENGINE GOT SO HOT THAT THE PLASTIC BELLY PAN WAS MELTED TO THE HEADER PIPES UNDER THE BIKE AND MY FENDER EXTENDER WAS MELTED IN A FASHION CONSISTENT WITH EXTREME ENGINE HEAT. THE BELLY PAN WAS SUBSEQUENTLY REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY.  *TR
